column1: Figure 3. Percent change decline or increase in prisoners under the jurisdiction of state or federal correctional authorities, by state, 2013–2014
Data source(s): National Prisoner Statistics Program
Figure 3. Percent change decline or increase in prisoners under the jurisdiction of state or federal correctional authorities, by state, 2013–2014

Note: Jurisdiction refers to the legal authority of state or federal correctional officials over a prisoner, regardless of where the prisoner is held. Counts based on all prisoners under the jurisdiction of state and federal correctional authorities. Alaska, Connecticut, Kansas, Nevada, and Wisconsin could not be calculated. See table 2 for detail.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics, 2013–2014.
